subject: Steroids
Bicycles and Bicycling
Tour de France (Bicycle Race)
lead_paragraph: A DNA sample taken from the former Tour de France champion Jan Ullrich has been matched to blood bags seized in the Spanish doping scandal, German prosecutors said Tuesday.
snippet: A DNA sample taken from the former Tour de France champion Jan Ullrich has been matched to blood bags seized in the Spanish doping scandal, German prosecutors said Tuesday.
